import React from 'react' import { CInputGroup, CInputGroupPrepend, CInputGroupText, CInput, CIcon, } from '@coreui/react' import ArticleProvider from "../../context/ArticleContext" const TitleInput =()=>{ const {article,updateArticle}=useContext(ArticleProvider.Context) return
{ updateArticle("titleEn", e.target.value) console.log("article",article) }} /> {/* */}
} export default TitleInput
